value.name: Soulmates
value.overview: Two ex-schoolmates bump into each other while on a trip to Shillong. Priyanshu, an aspiring music composer who is in Shillong chasing the girl of a rock band accidentally meets his schoolmate Anshul Chauhan who is on a solo bike trip across northeast. Two meet unexpectedly and fall in love, or maybe they don't, but both of them have been giving some really adorable vibes.

value.name: Soulmates
value.overview: Fifteen years into the future, science has made a discovery that changes the lives of everyone on the planet – a test that unequivocally tells you who your soulmate is.

value.name: Our Sister's Soulmate
value.overview: 27 year old Adachi Momoko lost both her parents in an accident when she was in third year high school. She then gave up going to college and has been working at a home centre for the past nine years while supporting her three younger brothers who are now 20, 17, and 14 year old respectively.

value.name: The Mask Soulmate
value.original_name: The Mask Soulmate หน้ากากคู่แท้
value.overview: Dressed in intricate costumes, celebrity duos try to sing their way to the finals while hiding their identities in this off-the-wall competition.

value.name: Soulmate
value.overview: Dong-wook, a playboy who no one can even dare to follow.“My boyfriend of 5 years!! He is definitely my soulmate!!”Soo-kyung, a girl who only looks at one man like a sunflower; a perfect, pure hearted character.Two people who have never seen each other, and who live on the opposite sides of the world from each other live and love in their own way, but from some point on they start to move towards the same dream and feel the same physiological feelings.Two people who have met by fate in a world full of mixed up fates.Now, the most amazing things, which no one could have ever thought of, start to unfold between the two...

value.name: Rock Soulmate
value.overview: A story about an aspiring rocker who encounters repeated obstacles in his musical journey. He exchanges souls with a young woman due to an accident. Coming from a place where they hate each other, the two slowly grow to like each other as they figure out how to switch back.

value.name: The Soulmate
value.overview: Nan Yu was originally the protagonist of the game with the Mary Sue plot, but she woke up to find she was in the Republic of China and shared the body with the detective game master Gao Han. Despite their competition, they were forced to work together to solve strange cases.

value.name: Soulmate Adventure
value.overview: It is rumored in the martial world that a mystery white-haired girl suddenly appeared around the thief Feng Ling Er. She is so powerful that many martial arts masters can't defeat her. The girl's identity, the source of her power and her influence to the world all caused discussion among the public. But Feng Ling Er and the white-haired girl named Bai Yu Xiu never care about it. They travel the world with pleasure, unaware of a great conspiracy coming towards them.

value.name: Soulmates: The Series
value.overview: BL web series about an older student who has to choose between two of his younger admirers - a ghost who might be the right one for him, and the other, a human that he likes.

value.name: Be My (Soul)mate
value.original_name: ร่วมหอลงโรง
value.overview: A young man leaves his home to pursue his dream of becoming an engineering student. He ends up sharing a room with a popular judo athlete who frequently struggles with relationship issues. As roommates, they support each other as friends, keeping their romantic lives separate—until one becomes single, sparking a growing closeness and undeniable attraction between them.

value.name: Saimdang, Memoir of Colors
value.overview: An art history lecturer, unfairly disgraced for refusing to certify a suspicious painting, endeavors to set the record straight by exploring the mystery of a 16th-century artist using a diary that may lead her to the genuine painting.
